chantey.title: Johnny Boker
chantey.text: Oh! do, my Johnny Boker, come rock and roll me Over; Do, my Johnny Boker, _do._
chantey.abc: X: 353 T: Johnny Boker C: Trad. M: 2/4 L: 1/8 K: G D|G G G G|G2 F G|A G F G|EF G2|D D D D|E2 F2|G2 z] w: Oh! do, my John-ny Bo-ker, come rock and roll me O--ver; Do, my John-ny Bo-ker, do.
